name: YHUK™ 3-Ply Surgical Masks Type IIR (20pcs/pack)
describe: YHUK™ 3-Ply Surgical Masks Type IIR, Medical face masks - Type IIR - High splash protection

overview.title: YHUK™ 3-Ply Surgical Masks Type IIR (20pcs/pack)
overview.text: YHUK™ 3-Ply Surgical Masks Type IIR is composed of ear-loops, nose clip and tie-band, made of non-woven fiber fabric. Plays the role of isolation and protection through filtration, the fixed nose clip enhances the protection of the mouth and nose. The ear-loops medical surgical is more convenient to wear and remove.

specifications.value:
Main Body: Meltdown and nonwoven fabrics
Ear loops: Elastane cord

Standard CN: YY 0469-2011
Standard EU: 14683:2019 Type IIR
DIN ISO 13485:2016

productDetail:
YHUK™ 3-Ply Surgical Masks Type IIR
Bacterial Filtration Efficiency (BFE): ≥ 98%

Breathing Resistance (Differential pressure): 37.9~41.5 Pa/cm2

Microbial Cleanliness (Bioburden): <= 20 CFU/g
Splash Fluid Resistance: NA
Penetration of Synthetic Blood Pressure (16.0kPa, 120mmHg): None Seen
The product conforms to EN 14683:2019 Type IIR. It is certified by 'TUV SUD'.
The product conforms to YY/T 0469-2011 and is certified by 'Beijing center for quality supervision and inspection of medical devices, state food and drug administration', a China National Accreditation Service for Conformity Assessment (CNAS) listed testing laboratory.
The factory is certified by China National Medical Products Administration (NMPA).
